long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flag harmful and unlawful language in emails before you hit “send.”

Reflect AI™ integrates seamlessly with Gmail™ to flag harmful and unlawful language in real-time, while guiding users to more collaborative communication. For companies of all sizes and industries, Reflect AI flags damaging language before it is sent, reducing the risk of costly litigation stemming from harmful communication. For individuals, Reflect AI is an ally, elevating awareness around harmful and respectful language.

Better communication. Less Litigation.
